analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SingleTokenLocker.lockup (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#331-348):
	External calls:
	- ensureTokensAvailable(amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#343)
	- promise = createPromise(recipient,amount,lockedUntil) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#344)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- promisedTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#344)

Reentrancy in SingleTokenLocker.lockup (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#331-348):
	External calls:
	- ensureTokensAvailable(amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#343)
	- promise = createPromise(recipient,amount,lockedUntil) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#344)
	- doConfirm(promise) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#348)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockedTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#348)

SingleTokenLocker.withdrawUncommittedTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#425-430) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#430)

SingleTokenLocker.withdrawAllUncommittedTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#431-435) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,uncommittedTokenBalance()) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#435)

SingleTokenLocker.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#454-466) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(tokenAddress).transfer(to,amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#466)

SingleTokenLocker.ensureTokensAvailable (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,this,amount.sub(uncommittedBalance)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol)

SingleTokenLocker.canCollect (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#476-485) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (promises[promiseId].state == PromiseState.confirmed || promises[promiseId].state == PromiseState.pending) && block.timestamp >= promises[promiseId].lockedUntil (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#478-485)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/22/0x55272df80297fbc078952d80ebe82b62e4b0dee2.sol#1): it allows old versions
